Private Chat GPT for private equity firm
1
Developed a secure conversation AI platform leveraging GPT models that enables 
users to have interactive conversations. Deployed the platform on client’s Azure 
ecosystem and implemented server ring-fencing measures,  along with real-time 
logging of prompts, usage, and model costs.
Private Equity Firm

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking for a secure conversation AI platform leveraging GPT models that enables users to have interactive conversations 
along with real-time logging of prompts, usage, and model costs. You want to harness the power of Generative AI in a secure 
manner in aiding daily activities such as content generation, building financial reports and investor calls notes summarization, 
market research support, etc.
Private equity firm company needs private ChatGPT 
2
Your value is enhanced. 
You have a potential savings of ~$3M through enhanced operational efficiency and accelerated response times by reducing the 
time spent on manual data interpretation and optimizing report preparation. You have also enabled the organization to safely 
harness the power of Generative AI in their daily workflows without concerns of security and data privacy.
PRIVATE CHATGPT FOR PRIVATE 
EQUITY FIRM
KEY RESULT   
•
~$3M potential savings
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Generative AI
•
Application 
development
•
Product development
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to develop a secure conversation AI platform leveraging GPT models that enables users to have 
interactive conversations, deploy the platform on Azure ecosystem and implement server ring-fencing measures,  along with real-
time logging of prompts, usage, and model costs, including:
1)
Designing and developing a user-friendly conversational AI platform leveraging Azure OpenAI APIs
2) Implementing various features to engage users of the platform including searchable chat history, custom instructions, prompt 
guides, and user feedback (like/dislike). Additionally, also developing a ‘Share Chat’ feature to enable seamless collaboration 
with other members of the organization.
3) Deploying the platform securely on client’s Azure environment, with ring-fencing measures implemented to ensure data 
integrity and confidentiality
4) Developing a dashboard on Power BI to enable real-time monitoring of usage trends and costs

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Designed and developed a user-friendly conversational AI platform leveraging Azure OpenAI APIs
•
Implemented various features to engage users of the platform including searchable chat history, custom instructions, prompt guides, and user feedback 
(like/dislike). Additionally, also developed a ‘Share Chat’ feature to enable seamless collaboration with other members of the organization
•
Deployed the platform securely on client’s Azure environment, with ring-fencing measures implemented to ensure data integrity and confidentiality
•
Developed a dashboard on Power BI to enable real-time monitoring of usage trends and costs.
Situation
•
Client wanted to harness the power of Generative AI in a secure manner in aiding daily activities such as content generation, building financial reports and 
investor calls notes summarization, market research support, etc.
•
Partnered with the client to develop a secure conversation AI platform leveraging GPT models that enables users to have interactive conversations along 
with real-time logging of prompts, usage, and model costs.
Private ChatGPT for Private Equity Firm
3
Impact
•
Potential savings of ~$3M through enhanced operational efficiency and accelerated response times by reducing the time spent on manual data interpretation 
and optimizing report preparation
•
Enabled the organization to safely harness the power of generative AI in their daily workflows without concerns of security and data privacy
